import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import {loadFirebase} from '../lib/db.js'; export default class addJob extends React.Component { constructor(){ super(); this.initial_state = { JobContract : '', jobName : '', jobArea:'', japaneseSkill:'' }; this.state = this.initial_state; } handleChange = (event) =>{ this.setState({[event.target.name] : event.target.value}); } addJob = event => { event.preventDefault(); let firebase = loadFirebase() const userRef = firebase.firestore().collection('test').add({ JobContract: this.state.JobContract, jobName: this.state.jobName, jobArea:this.state.jobArea, japaneseSkill:this.state.japaneseSkill }); this.setState({ JobContract: '', jobName: '', jobArea:'', japaneseSkill:'' }); }; render() { return (
) }}
